data.name: Ballaholic x Gel Quantum 180 'Cream Metropolis'
data.story: Designed in partnership with the streetball-obsessed Japanese label, the Ballaholic x ASICS Gel Quantum 180 ‘Cream Metropolis’ delivers a lifestyle runner that combines vibrant hues with a smooth, cushioned ride. An off-white textile upper is reinforced with contrasting blue no-sew skins and charcoal suede overlays at the toe and heel, the latter stamped with Ballaholic branding on the lateral side. The cream-colored foam midsole is fortified with 180 degrees of visible Gel cushioning.

data.name: Air Jordan 12 Retro PS 'Arctic Pink'
data.story: Built for little kids, the Air Jordan 12 Retro PS ‘Arctic Pink’ delivers a refreshed take on the classic silhouette that Michael Jordan wore when he captured his fifth NBA title. In addition to the non-traditional palette, the stitched upper is treated to a distressed finish, featuring textured pink remnants that create an abstract pattern on a light grey backdrop. A more intense shade of pink lands on the sneaker’s collar lining, pull tab and branding elements, which include an embroidered Jumpman atop the tongue.

data.name: adidas ZX 2K Phormar Craig Green White
Jordan 12 Retro Arctic Punch (GS)
data.story: Constructed for big kids, the Air Jordan 12 Retro GS ‘Arctic Pink’ updates the vintage mid-top with energetic pops of color. They take the form of hot pink detailing on the sneaker’s heel tab, molded eyelets and Jumpman tongue branding. A more diffuse shade of pink is spread out over the cracked suede upper to create an irregular, abstract pattern. The mid-top rides on a Phylon midsole, reinforced with a rigid shank plate and a herringbone rubber outsole underfoot.

data.name: adidas ZX 2K Phormar Craig Green Blue
Air Jordan 12 Retro TD 'Arctic Pink'
data.story: Made for a new generation of Michael Jordan fans, the Air Jordan 12 Retro TD ‘Arctic Pink' presents a colorful take on the silhouette that MJ wore when he clinched his penultimate NBA championship in 1997. Hot pink coloring on the sneaker’s pull tab, collar lining and branding elements is rendered in a diluted shade throughout the distressed upper, resulting in an abstract pattern that’s offset by pristine white overlays in synthetic leather. A matching white foam sole unit offers lightweight cushioning for little feet.

data.name: adidas Stan Smith OG Velcro Fairway Green
Jordan 3 Retro Georgetown (2021)
data.story: The Air Jordan 3 Retro ‘Georgetown’ is clad in the signature colors of the Hoyas, the team that Michael Jordan victimized on the way to an NCAA national championship. The classic silhouette features a navy tumbled leather upper, reinforced with signature elephant print overlays at the toe and heel. Jumpman branding hits adorn the grey synthetic leather tongue and molded navy heel panel. Lightweight cushioning is provided by a polyurethane midsole enhanced with a visible Nike Air unit under the heel.

data.name: InstaPump Fury OG 'Ombre Pack - Digital Glow'
Air Jordan 3 Retro GS 'Georgetown'
data.story: Built for big kids, the Air Jordan 3 Retro GS ‘Georgetown’ dresses the classic silhouette in the Hoyas’ signature hues. Navy tumbled leather is utilized on the upper, reinforced by a tonal synthetic leather mudguard and signature elephant print overlays at the toe and heel. An embroidered Jumpman icon graces the grey leather tongue, joining a second Jumpman logo embossed on the heel overlay. A standard polyurethane midsole houses visible Nike Air cushioning in the heel.

data.name: Air Jordan 3 Retro PS 'Georgetown'
data.story: Crafted for little kids, the Air Jordan 3 Retro PS ‘Georgetown’ features the signature colors of the Hoyas, the first in a long line of competitors felled by Michael Jordan with the final shot in a title game. The upper is built with navy tumbled leather, accented with grey elephant-print overlays at the toe and heel. Both the sneaker’s tongue and molded heel tab are trimmed with iconic Jumpman branding. A foam midsole delivers a cushioned ride, absent the visible Air sole unit of the mainline release.

data.name: KidSuper Studios x Mirage Mox 'Forever Blue'
data.story: Drawn from a larger series with the Brooklyn-based artist collective, the KidSuper Studios x PUMA Mirage Mox ‘Forever Blue’ highlights pastel hues on a lifestyle runner inspired by EDM and festival culture. The powder blue nylon upper is reinforced with forefoot and heel overlays in suede and gum rubber. On the lateral side, ‘Studios’ is embroidered atop a nylon Formstrip with exposed foam edges. The sneaker rides on a lightweight EVA misole, supported underfoot by a grippy rum rubber outsole.

data.name: Question Low 'Glitch'
data.story: The Reebok Question Low ‘Glitch’ updates Allen Iverson’s debut signature shoe with a white leather upper accented with vibrant pops of blue and purple. The contrasting hues are applied to the sneaker’s various branding elements, as well as the reinforced leather toe cap in a gradient color-fade effect. The low-top sits on a plush EVA midsole with visible Hexalite cushioning. Underfoot, a translucent rubber outsole repeats the dual purple and blue color scheme.

data.name: KidSuper Studios x Trailfox Boots 'Lupine Paloma'
data.story: The KidSuper Studios x PUMA Trailfox Boots ‘Lupine Paloma’ offers up a playful, experimental interpretation of the rugged outdoor silhouette. The Brooklyn-based creative collective dresses the sneaker-boot hybrid in lavender nylon mesh with contrasting beige suede overlays. Flat ghillie-style laces are supplemented by a secondary set of rope laces in a bright crimson hue, fed through metal eyelets set within a series of tan nubuck straps. KidSuper branding lands on the leather heel overlay and custom sockliner. Underfoot, a high-traction rubber outsole delivers sure footing on uneven terrain.

data.name: KidSuper Studios x Ralph Sampson 70 Low 'White'
data.story: Created in partnership with the Brooklyn-based creative collective, the KidSuper Studios x PUMA Ralph Sampson 70 Low ‘White’ delivers a street-ready take on the vintage hoops shoe. In lieu of traditional laces, the white leather upper is secured with dual hook-and-loop straps, each embellished with KidSuper Studios branding. PUMA Formstrips on either side panel features exposed foam edges for a deconstructed look and feel. A durable gum rubber cupsole anchors the slip-on silhouette.

data.name: Air Jordan 3 Retro TD 'Georgetown'
data.story: The Air Jordan 3 Retro TD ‘Georgetown’ gives the vintage model a scaled-down makeover that leaves the sneaker’s iconic details intact. They include an embroidered Jumpman icon on the grey leather leather tongue and elephant-print overlays at the toe and heel. Combined with a navy tumbled leather upper, the resulting palette is redolent of the signature hues of the Georgetown Hoyas, the team that Michael Jordan and the Tar Heels defeated in the ‘82 NCAA championship game.

data.name: Nike Air Presto Sunrise Sunset
data.story: The Nike Air Presto ‘Sunrise’ brings back a gradient CO.JP colorway that originally released in 2001 exclusively to the Japanese market. The yellow-to-violet color scheme accompanies a comfortable build originally described as a T-shirt for feet. A semi-translucent TPU cage adds lightweight structure to an upper made with spacer mesh, a breathable material that offers stretch in every direction. Lightweight cushioning arrives via a Phylon midsole with encapsulated Nike Air cushioning.

data.name: KidSuper Studios x RS-2K Slip-On 'Camo'
data.story: Launching as part of a larger series with the Brooklyn-based creative collective, the KidSuper Studios x PUMA RS-2K Slip-On ‘Camo’ revamps the sneaker that takes its cues from early 2000s running style. A unique camo print covers the padded nylon upper, equipped with an elastic collar and webbing pull tab for easy on and off. An embroidered heel patch displays dual PUMA and KidSuper branding. Lightweight cushioning arrives via a sculpted injection-molded EVA midsole.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Ash Pearl
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 ‘Ash Pearl’ applies contrast color blocking to the re-engineered Primeknit upper. Most of the knit build features a blend of indigo, grey and navy fibers, while the top half of the sneaker’s lateral side is rendered in subtle cream and beige tones. The latter hue is repeated on the signature post-dyed monofilament side stripe. The lightweight sneaker is supported by a full-length Boost midsole, its sidewalls reinforced with an off-white rubber cage.

data.name: Wacko Maria x Authentic LX 'Records - Cream'
adidas Yeezy QNTM Sea Teal
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Quantum ‘Sea Teal’ dresses the lifestyle silhouette in a breathable knit upper that blends mostly neutral grey and black tones with washed-out teal accents. A soft elastic collar provides a comfortable fit around the ankle, while the seamless heel counter is designed to hug the back of the foot for enhanced containment. A semi-translucent rubber cage shores up the full-length Boost midsole, supported underfoot by a herringbone-traction gum rubber outsole.

data.name: Gel Lyte 3 OG 'Back Streets of Japan - Aqua'
data.story: Releasing as part of the ‘Back Streets of Japan’ pack, the ASICS Gel Lyte 3 OG ‘Aqua’ showcases assorted pastel hues on the vintage running shoe originally released in 1990. Textile and synthetic suede make up the composition of the upper, equipped with signature split tongue construction and accented with navy leather side stripes outlined in fuchsia. The soft color palette is repeated on the lightweight EVA midsole, fitted with Gel technology in the heel for enhanced impact protection.

data.name: Jayson Tatum x Air Jordan 35 'Greatest Gift'
data.story: Crafted specifically for the NBA star, the Jayson Tatum x Air Jordan 35 ‘Greatest Gift’ showcases a vibrant mix of colors that pay tribute to the athlete’s mother and grandmother. On the left shoe, the red patent leather tongue is embroidered with Tatum’s initials, while a purple midfoot overlay displays his birth year. The latter hue is repeated on toe box detailing inscribed with the phrase ‘Women in Power.’ Custom sockliners give the nod to Jordan Brand’s ‘Fearless Ones’ campaign, spotlighting individuals who strive for positive change within their communities.

data.name: Pharrell x Crazy BYW 2.0 'Triple Black'
data.story: The Pharrell x adidas Crazy BYW 2.0 ‘Triple Black’ is drawn from a monochromatic collection that extends a creative partnership originally launched in 2014. The lightweight hoops shoe makes use of a breathable textile and mesh upper, fortified with tonal synthetic leather overlays and accented with a series of small triangles throughout — a nod to Pharrell’s signature Hu branding. Responsive cushioning arrives via a Boost midsole, painted black and reinforced with a herringbone rubber outsole.

data.name: Wacko Maria x Authentic LX 'Records - Pink'
adidas Futurecraft 4D 2021 Black Green
data.story: The 2021 reissue of the adidas Futurecraft 4D ‘Core Black’ brings back the running shoe’s OG colorway from 2018. Breathable Primeknit is utilized on the upper, accented with reflective grey three-stripes and lined in textile for a comfortable, sock-like fit. The lightweight build is mounted on adidas’ innovative 4D midsole, delivering finely tuned cushioning based on 17 years of running data. Finished in a Linen Green hue, the lattice structure is developed using a blend of light, oxygen and liquid resin.

data.name: Nike Air Max 95 Kim Jones Black Total Orange
data.story: The Kim Jones x Nike Air Max 95 ‘Total Orange’ reunites the world-renowned menswear designer with the Swoosh. Twinned with an accompanying ‘Volt’ colorway, this pair features layered grey side panels in an inverted gradient finish. A black mini-Swoosh is joined by a series of perforations inspired by the Air Max 360. A translucent Nexkin overlay partially covers the sneaker’s webbing eyelets, rendered in a bold orange finish and misaligned for enhanced visual impact. The same eye-catching hue is repeated on the sneaker’s visible Max Air units. Kim Jones branding adorns the lateral heel.

data.name: Wacko Maria x Authentic LX 'Records - Baby Blue'
Nike Air Max 90 Fried Chicken
data.story: The Nike Air Max 90 SE ‘Swoosh Mart Fried Chicken’ draws inspiration from the distinctive fried chicken packaging used by Japanese convenience stores like Family Mart. The retro runner features yellow and white stripes throughout the upper, including a tearaway outer layer on the toe box and collar. Those sections reveal orange suede paneling with assorted branding elements — including ‘Hot Air’ and ‘AM90’ — in a cartoon font. Chrome detailing lands on the sneaker’s molded eyelets, stitched-on heel patch and cropped Swoosh, while the graphic sockliner depicts a pair of metal tongs.

data.name: Nike Air Max 95 Kim Jones Total Volt
data.story: Developed in tandem with the celebrated menswear designer, the Kim Jones x Nike Air Max 95 ‘Volt’ updates the retro runner with refreshed details and an OG-inspired color palette. Morse code-like dots and dashes enliven side panels in charcoal grey suede, contrasted by neon pops on the sneaker’s webbing eyelets and visible Max Air units. A mini-Swoosh is added to the toe, while Kim Jones branding adorns the lateral heel. Underfoot, the translucent rubber outsole features an oversized Nike logo, with ‘KJ’ integrated into the Swoosh.

data.name: Zoom Freak 2 GS 'Denim'
data.story: Built for big kids, the Nike Zoom Freak 2 GS ‘Denim’ dresses Giannis Antetokounmpo’s second signature shoe with a grey textile upper, overlaid with white synthetic leather on the medial side and accented with mismatched aqua and Bright Mango accents. The low-top rides on a speckled foam midsole, bolstered with a molded TPU piece on the lateral sidewall for added containment and stability. Underfoot, a decoupled rubber outsole provides flexible traction.

data.name: Kyrie 7 GS 'Hip-Hop'
data.story: Made for big kids, the Nike Kyrie 7 GS ‘Hip-Hop’ honors the influential role that Brooklyn played in the history of rap culture. The homage is cemented with a boom box graphic embroidered on the heel, while the white and black color scheme gives the nod to the hometown Nets. The mid-top rides on a resilient foam midsole, accented with a contrasting pop of mint green on the lateral forefoot. 360-degree traction arrives via a computer-generated rubber outsole.

data.name: Kyrie 7 'Brooklyn Beats'
data.story: Celebrating Brooklyn’s outsized influence within rap culture at large, the Nike Kyrie 7 ‘Brooklyn Beats’ features a boom box heel graphic and a simple white and black color scheme in honor of the hometown Nets. An unexpected pop of mint green lands on the midsole, which packs a forefoot Air Zoom Turbo unit designed to bend in every direction for enhanced on-court responsiveness. Underfoot, the rubber outsole delivers multi-directional grip via a scientifically designed traction pattern.

data.name: Zoom Freak 2 PS 'Denim'
data.story: Constructed for little kids, the Nike Zoom Freak 2 PS ‘Denim’ outfits Giannis Antetokounmpo’s second signature shoe with a grey textile upper. In addition to an oversized black Swoosh on the lateral side panel, the left and right shoe are enlivened with mismatched branding elements in aqua and Bright Mango accents. The low-top sits on a full-length foam midsole, dusted with speckled detailing and reinforced by a decouple rubber outsole.

data.name: Zoom Freak 2 'Denim'
data.story: The Nike Zoom Freak 2 ‘Denim’ treats Giannis Antetokounmpo’s second signature shoe to a subtle makeover, highlighted by a grey textile upper and mismatched accents. The right shoe features vibrant teal branding elements that include Giannis’ personal logo on the lateral heel and an embroidered Swoosh on the medial overlay, while the left shoe is enlivened with pops of Bright Mango in the same areas. Speckled detailing is applied to a resilient foam midsole that packs Zoom Air cushioning in the forefoot.

data.name: LeBron 18 'Home'
data.story: Celebrating LeBron James’ adopted hometown of Los Angeles, the Nike LeBron 18 ‘Home’ features a white Knitposite 2.0 upper with contrasting accents in gold and black. The latter hue is applied to the elastic collar and oversized TPU heel counter, which cradles the back of the foot for a locked-in fit. Responsive cushioning is provided by a Cushlon midsole and full-length Zoom Air unit, its back half nestled within a visible Max Air bag placed under the heel. Inside the shoe, LeBron’s jersey number is printed on the sockliner.

data.name: Kyrie 7 EP 'Brooklyn Beats'
data.story: The Nike Kyrie 7 EP ‘Brooklyn Beats’ celebrates the link between Brooklyn and rap culture, highlighted by an embroidered heel graphic that depicts the Brooklyn Bridge atop a boom box with basketball-shaped speakers. A neutral black and white palette is applied to the sneaker’s breathable mesh upper, mounted on a foam midsole enhanced with an Air Zoom Turbo unit in the forefoot. This EP version is exclusive to Asia and features an extra-durable rubber outsole made for play on outdoor courts.
